text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Hmm Hmm H-Hmm♪ It's time for a bath!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Have a second?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wah! Ayabe-san! Do you need something?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Your hairband… You left it on my bed. Stop leaving your things in weird places.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Eh!? I dropped it? I didn't even notice. But thanks for bringing it to me♪ It would've been a problem if I didn't have it after my bath!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's right! You never come here, so why don't we take a bath together, Ayabe-san?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: I know you prefer showers, but your Selection Race is coming up soon. Soaking in a bath and relaxing would be good for you♪

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: No…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Aghh… Hmm, guess that didn't work…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Haa… Jeez, what's with her…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: If you were still here… would you…?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Would you… treat me like she does?

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: "You see those two stars? I heard that they'll be together forever since someone pleaded with God for it to happen."

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: "Hehe… One day, when I become a star… I hope we'll be together forever too."

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Sometimes I feel like someone is with me. I've had this feeling since before I can remember. Someone so close that I could almost touch them, yet so far that I can't even see them.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: As I stare up at that red star, the feeling only grows stronger. So ever since I was a child, I would often speak with that someone under the starry sky.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Whenever my mother would see me doing that… She would laugh uncomfortably.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ngh… Nghhh…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You're going to end up oversleeping…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: But for some reason I can't sleep! Ayabe-san, you have nights like that too, right?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I do, but they're probably different than yours.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Is that so? Well hey… Since we both can't sleep, why don't we have a little chat?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: No. Go to sleep.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ehh!? But I'm so lonely, Ayabe-san!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Shut up.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: No no no no! If you won't talk to me, then I'll just have to sneak into bed with you.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You better not do that…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: What will we… even talk about?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Yay♪ Well, we should talk about something simple…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, how about the first time you ran? I'd love to hear about your memories♪

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: The first time…

text_block_list.name: Race Organiser
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes! You were quite a spectacular racer! So please enter your daughter, Admire Vega-chan, into the "Pony Cup!"

text_block_list.name: Ayabe's Mom
text_block_list.text: So that's what you want… Hey, Ayabe-chan… What do you think abou―

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: I wanna enter!!

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: I really, really wanna enter!! I… want to run!!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I still remember… I've always been a silent person, but I responded in such an excited way… as if I was possessed by someone else. My mother seemed surprised, and frightened.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: The "Pony Cup!" Hehe, so that was your first race!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: How was it when you finally got to race? How did it feel?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: What I felt…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: The smell of the turf… made my heart race. The incredible sensation of moving forward, cutting through the wind.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: My heart was beating like an alarm bell. The scenery flew behind me beautifully, almost like a meteor…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ayabe-san…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: What…?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Eh! Ah, I'm sorry! Well… Umm…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: "Possessed by someone else…?"

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: Yay, Yaay! Mom, I did it! I won! Ehe! Ehehe…

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: Hic… H-Huh? Wh-Why am I… Are these… tears…? Why… won't they stop…!?

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: Why…? I… I umm… I really liked racing. I… was having so much fun, it's almost like I wasn't me anymore…?

text_block_list.name: Young Ayabe
text_block_list.text: But still… I just feel so lonely… and so sad… Mommy… Why… Why is this happening to me…?

text_block_list.name: Ayabe's Mom
text_block_list.text: Ayabe-chan…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: This conversation is over… The dorm leader will be making her rounds soon anyways.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Ah, but, Ayabe-san…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I said it's over. Now go to sleep…

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Okay…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Sometime after the "Pony Cup" my mother finally told me.

text_block_list.name: Ayabe's Mom
text_block_list.text: Honey, you actually have a… little sister.

text_block_list.name: Ayabe's Mom
text_block_list.text: She was… your twin. But… she was stillborn.
